thread.title: Josh Groban postpones Houston show
thread.title_full: Josh Groban postpones Houston show - Houston Chronicle

author: chron.com
title: Josh Groban postpones Houston show
text:
Photo: James Dimmock Image 1 of / 1 1 Josh Groban says he is better with his voice than with his jazz hands. Josh Groban says he is better with his voice than with his jazz hands. Photo: James Dimmock Josh Groban postpones Houston show 1 / 1 Back to Gallery Josh Groban has rescheduled his three Texas dates due to illness, including an Oct. 26 show at Houston's Hobby Center.
The new date will be Dec. 21, also at the Hobby Center. Today's Austin show moves to Dec. 19; and Sunday's Dallas show moves to Dec. 22.
Tickets for the original dates will be honored at the rescheduled shows. Refunds are also available at point of purchase. More information is available at ticketmaster.com.
Read the Chronicle's interview with Groban here .
